conbody.p: You can record your conversation with a student using the Record conversation mode from the student menu.
An icon with double red dots will appear on the student panel ( ).
Whenever conversation recording mode is engaged, a red dot next to the Record conversation item in pop-up menu will change to a check mark.

Conversation recording are saved as MP3 file in a sub-folder of the teacher folder, e.g. Jane Austen\Waves\ENG101\2015-02-06\John Doe (13-05) conversation.mp3, where
John Doe – teacher name,
ENG101 – class,
2015-02-06 – recording date in form year-month-day,
John Doe – student's name,
13-05 – recording time.
conbody.note: If selected student is paired with another student for a conversation, both voices will be recorded in the same file. The file name will reflect this, e.g. John Doe + Mike Brown (13-00) conversation.mp3.
